Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label different land habitats (e.g., playground, garden, forest).
The student can draw and label different water habitats (e.g., pond, stream, lake).
The student can include and label various plants found in each habitat (e.g., trees, grasses, bushes, flowering plants).
The student can include and label different animals found in each habitat (e.g., lizards, squirrels, ants, fish, clams).
The student can show patterns by comparing the variety of living things seen across different habitats.
